name: w2pe Beaver Slider
author: WebworksBD

sections.description:
“w2pe-beaverslider” you can download it for you next image slider into wordpress blog or site. It base on “Beaverslider”.

Detailed features:

  • Use it as your home page slider, into post or page.
  • User friendly.
  • You can use it into post and page by shortcode [w2pe_bSlider] into page or page and into template file using <?php if (function_exists('w2pe_bslider')) { w2pe_bslider(); } ?>

Note:

We are not sole authority or not allowed to redistribute the main library. We just used the files that is allow to use the slider on any kinds of websites or
use for private purposes or use for commercial purposes. If you want to learn more about Beaverslider then please Click here
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire w2pe-beaverslider folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

You will find ‘w2pe-beaverslider’ menu in your WordPress admin panel.

For basic usage, you can also have a look at the plugin homepage plugin section.
sections.faq:
Is it free?

This is 100% free for wordpress user to use.

How can I get a support?

For support purpose you can contact plugin homepage plugin section.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

  • You can change image order of your slider

1.0

  • initial lunch.
